title: The One Where They Celebrate Pride Month and Real Housewives
description:
Lala celebrates Pride with her gusbands, Logan Noh and Leo DeMarsh, and of course that includes some serious Real Housewives talk too! They break down the new Hulu doc, “The Housewife and the Hustler,” dish on Kathy Hilton, comment on RHONY, and share their favorite Housewives taglines! Plus, they answer your questions including fav drag queens, dealing with haters, life changes since the arrival of Baby O, and fashion!

Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
itunes:author: Lala Kent | Cumulus Podcast Network
